articles.author: Ashley Strickland, CNN
articles.title: Meet the orbiters that help rovers on Mars talk to Earth - CNN
articles.description: Orbiters around Mars act as dual-purpose workhorses, relaying data and images from the surface missions to Earth while studying various aspects of the planet. NASA's MRO and MAVEN orbiters will assist during the landing of the Perseverance rover next week.

articles.title: Single gene alteration may separate Homo sapiens from Neanderthals - Daily Mail
articles.description: Experts catalogued differences between the genomes of modern humans and those of  Neanderthals and Denisovans. One gene alteration - NOVA1 - is particularly important.

articles.title: Moon landing: Hidden messages from Apollo 11 mission discovered by NASA intern - Daily Express
articles.description: THE MOON LANDING of Apollo 11 was powered by a huge leap forward in technology, including computer programming that drove the flight software - and, incredibly, hidden messages were uncovered inside the code almost half a century later.
